title: Celanese 's revenue 2007 to 2018
summary: Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2011 to 2013, and finally slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2016.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
The highest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 6802.0 was reached at Year 2014
The lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 5389.0 was reported at Year 2016
